itemDescription: English pianist, composer, lyricist, and actor. He is best known for co-writing the songs "We'll Meet Again" and "There'll Always Be an England". (1914-1974)

wikipedia_page.main: Ross Parker (born Albert Rostron Parker) (16 August 1914 – 1 August 1974) was an English pianist, composer, lyricist and actor. He is best known for co-writing the songs "We'll Meet Again" and "There'll Always Be an England".
